description: Finds rows in a datatable that match a search string or regular expression.

input.name: column
input.description: The name of column in the datatable to be searched.

output.name: blanks
output.description: A new datatable with the rows that match the testing expression; otherwise, an empty datatable is returned.

output.name: non-blanks
output.description: A new datatable with the rows that *did not match* the testing expression.
